title: Solarpunk is a co-op 'cozy survival game' set in a world of airships and floating islands
description: Some comfy farming, crafting and automation, light survival systems, and blimp-based exploration.

description: We're on the ground out in Taipei to give you the lowdown on the biggest show in PC hardware.

title: Deep Rock Galactic studio remakes cosmetic DLC after fans complain: 'You’re putting down good money for these items, and you want them to stand out—we hear you!'
description: DRG's notoriously positive community comes through again.

description: These are a good source of XP for those last few levels.

description: Several Pride flag cosmetics will be added to the game for free.

title: Nvidia joins Apple, Amazon, Microsoft, and Alphabet in the $1 trillion club. But please don't forget us PC gamers, Jen-Hsun
description: After a spectacular earnings prediction last week, Nvidia has today passed the $1 trillion mark in terms of market capitalisation.

title: MMO scientists reckon the end of the world will be mostly unremarkable, apart from the 'relatively few' who go on a killing spree
description: It's the end of the world as we know it, and I feel not-so-fine.

description: I'd be happy to stare at just about any of these keyboards for eight hours a day.

description: Diablo 4 is having more of a launch week than a launch day; here's when you can actually play.

description: Manufacturers are going hard on PCIe 5.0 SSD cooling at Computex 2023.

title: Venerable Minecraft server gets shuttered, before the old guard got back together to save it
description: Mineplex is one of the biggest and longest running custom servers out there.

title: AI-generated story and dialogue is not going to work, says Dragon Age creator David Gaider: 'A lot of effort is going to be wasted on this'
description: The RPG veteran reveals that during his time at BioWare, the studio experimented with procedurally-generated quests—but they were ultimately a failure.

title: The ultimate McDonald's tie-in toy has arrived, a McNugget that plays Tetris
description: I'm rotatin' it

title: MSI's new line of Gaming X Slim graphics cards has made me irrationally angry
description: For one, they're slimmer, not slim.

title: After a full Computex day in 32 degree heat I've never been happier to sit in a gaming chair with a fan in the backrest
description: Cougar's upcoming Aero chair was right what I needed.

description: The thickest cooling solution known to man also has it's own processor.

description: Graphics cards are already huge, so manufacturers are going to have to get a bit more inventive with how to cool them.

description: New CPU shows off its AI-accelerating VPU tile.

title: Jen-Hsun says Intel's process tech is looking so good Nvidia's open to using its fabs for future GPUs
description: There's a chance Nvidia's future graphics cards are made by Intel not TSMC, while Intel graphics cards continue to be made by TSMC. What a world.

description: Street Fighter 6 sets the bar high with a comprehensive fighting game experience for both newcomers and veterans.
